education_text.0: Nadia Magnenat Thalmann is a      Computer graphics computer graphics scientist and robotician and is the founder and head of MIRALab at the      University of Geneva University of GenevaThalmann received an MS in Psychology, an MS in Biology and a Master in Biochemistry at the University of GenevaThalmann has made numerous research contributions in the general area of computer graphics and is best known for her work on simulating realistic virtual humans
